name: A Dog Tap Toy Pet Arcade Prize Claw Machine Game for Kids
name_original: A Dog Tap Toy Pet Arcade Prize Claw Machine Game for Kids
description:
What a fun game for all ages! Easy to understand & easy to play! If you have ever played a Prize Claw Machine at the Arcade or Grocery Store then you can play this version!

What's the twist? In this version of the Claw game you are dropping the stuffed animal (that being the cute Puppy dog!) into the shoot! During the fall there are gold stars that Puppy needs to collect before being saved in the bucket! The more stars collected - the better the score!

But wait! There is more! There are magnets that will pull Puppy in different directions and there are bones to bounce from and well, there are things that cause explosions that will disrupt Puppy from getting safely in to the bucket. So beware of those for sure!

- Lots of fun, unique and challenging levels!
- Nothing to buy to continue the game!
- Just hours of fun play!

Enjoy and remember to always take good care of your Puppy!
